ygData.subject: RE: but can they be looted????
ygData.msgSnippet: More and more quest items are increasingly becoming NODROP.  I have 5 dwarven tongues (the bandit tongues, and Rondo s tongue from CB) and I had them all in
ygData.messageBody:
More and more quest items are increasingly becoming NODROP. I have
5 dwarven tongues (the bandit tongues, and Rondo's tongue from CB) and
I had them all in the bank, each taking up 5 slots. I decided I would
buy a box, put them in the box, and then put them back. Much to my
dismay, when I put the box in the bank, it said I couldn't because
every tongue was now NODROP. I wish they would fix that. No I am
forced to carry around these damned tongues everywhere.


>From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: "'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'" <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] but can they be looted????
>Date: Wed, 11 Aug 1999 16:21:50 -0700
>
>From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>
>Thanks for that, but now I'm really confused. I must of misunderstood LORE
>items. I know you can have only one but I thought that made them no drop no
>trade. Can anyone please explain why an item, other than the newbie stuff
>and our summoned hammers might be No Drop. Or if they know of one.
>
>Thanks
>
>Chas
>
> > With the introduction of LORE items. That is the No drop/No trade items.
>
>Lore items aren't necessarily no drop/no trade. My Mistmoore shield is
>a Lore item that I routinely bank, loan to my bard friend, etc.
>
>As for when loot can be taken. Yes, lore items can be taken; no, nodrop
>items cannot be taken. And items can only be taken in a PvP venue; in a
>duel, there's no looting.
>
